overview:
Ravi Sharma is the operations director of an internet marketing company based in the UK, called The Technical Guys and he also owns Thinketc.com.

Ravi was born in Spring of 1983 in an uptown part of the most populous city in world, Mumbai - India. He graduated in his motherland until he moved to the Queen’s kingdom, UK, for further his educational qualification and he ended up doing what he loved to do, market and manage.

Managing international operations of an internet marketing company gave him exposure to all those aspects of the business which he always loved to explore.

An optimist, with an aura that reacts well and tickle the funny bone of those who the author accompanies. He believes to accomplish that which is declared impossible - to keep everyone happy.

Besides traveling, the author loves music and only Rock-n-roll is classified as music by the author. Read the blog called ‘Rock-and-old’ on thinketc.com to find the reason for the aforementioned. The author also loves dogs. He had a pet dog named Ozzy for over 13 years, who died of cancer. It was a fawn Labrador.

Foodie, hence, loves to eat and the author is a good cook too. So, if at all you catch you with this energetic, always young at heart man, then be ready to munch whilst you chat, as nothing goes down better in a conversation, as good food!
